scriptLines: query: (concat('<fetch><entity name="ww_qcendofrun"><all-attributes/><filter type="and"><condition attribute="modifiedon" operator="on-or-after" value="',$startTime,'"/><condition attribute="modifiedon" operator="on-or-before" value="',$endTime,'"/></filter></entity></fetch>'))) ~> qcendofrun

query: (concat('<fetch><entity name="ww_run"><all-attributes/><filter type="and"><condition attribute="modifiedon" operator="on-or-after" value="',$startTime,'"/><condition attribute="modifiedon" operator="on-or-before" value="',$endTime,'"/></filter></entity></fetch>'))) ~> Run

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT MAX(CAST(SWITCHOFFSET(modifiedon, -DATEPART(TZOFFSET, modifiedon AT TIME ZONE 'New Zealand Standard Time')) AS DATETIME)) AS last_modifiedon
FROM [Dataverse].[dbo].[ww_billofmaterials];
